name: Advanced Videobox
author: Tom

sections.description:
With this plugin you can add videos to your sidebar (or any other widgetized area of your site). Just copy and paste code of the video into the Advanced Video widget.
The Youtube’s original video code doesn’t pass W3C validation. The filtered video code of the Advanced Videobox will keep your site XHTML valid.
The plugin is easily customizable through widget panel. This plugin is ideal for music, tutorial, ads videos. Check for more on the plugin’s page

  • Easy to manage
  • Option to change width and height
  • Option to disable parameters that produce invalid XHTML code
  • Web 2.0 graphics
  • Add up to 20 videos
  • Easily customizable via CSS
  • Ideal plugin for music, tutorials, ads videos
  • You can add ANY videos, not only from Youtube. Just keep “Enable parameters” option checked.

Contributors/Changelog

 Version Date       Changes

 1.0.0   2009/14/01 Initial release     
 1.0.1   2009/15/01 Sucesfully tested on WordPress 2.9.2
 1.0.2   2009/15/11 Sucesfully tested on WordPress 3.0.1, minor tweaks

Thanks to all who sent bug reports and ideas for
improvements.
sections.installation:
1. Upload advanced-videobox to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Advanced Videobox through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Check for more on the plugin’s page
